00033 namespace network {
00034   namespace client {
00035 
00036     class service_net : public processor::service_base {
00037     public:
00038       typedef boost::shared_ptr<service_net> sptr;
00039       virtual ~service_net() {}
00040   
00041       static sptr make(const protocol::header& h,
00042                        const broadcaster::directory& d) {
00043         sptr result(new service_net(h, d));
00044         return result;
00045       }
00046   
00047       virtual std::string     id()            const { return header_.id(); }
00048       virtual ptime           approx_ptime()  const { return header_.approx_ptime(); }
00049       virtual boost::uint16_t stream_number() const { return header_.stream_number(); }
00050       virtual std::string     stream_name()   const { return directory_.stream_name_of(stream_number()); }
00051 
00052       virtual void put_result(processor::result_base::sptr rp) {}
00053       virtual processor::result_base::sptr get_result(std::string name) const { return processor::result_base::sptr();  }
00054 
00055     protected:
00056       service_net(const protocol::header& h,
00057                   const broadcaster::directory& d)
00058         : service_base()
00059         , header_(h)
00060         , directory_(d) {}
00061   
00062     private:
00063       protocol::header header_;
00064       const broadcaster::directory& directory_;
00065     } ;
00066 
00067     class service_net_iq : public processor::service_iq {
00068     public:
00069       typedef boost::shared_ptr<service_net_iq> sptr;
00070       virtual ~service_net_iq() {}
00071   
00072       static sptr make(processor::service_base::sptr sp, const protocol::iq_info& hiq) {
00073         sptr result(new service_net_iq(sp, hiq));
00074         return result;
00075       }
00076   
00077       virtual std::string     id()                  const { return sp_->id(); }
00078       virtual ptime           approx_ptime()        const { return sp_->approx_ptime(); }
00079       virtual boost::uint16_t stream_number()       const { return sp_->stream_number(); }
00080       virtual std::string     stream_name()         const { return sp_->stream_name(); }
00081       virtual boost::uint32_t sample_rate_Hz()      const { return iq_info_.sample_rate_Hz(); }
00082       virtual double          center_frequency_Hz() const { return iq_info_.center_frequency_Hz(); }
00083       virtual float           offset_ppb()          const { return iq_info_.offset_ppb(); }
00084       virtual float           offset_ppb_rms()      const { return iq_info_.offset_ppb_rms(); }
00085   
00086       virtual void put_result(processor::result_base::sptr rp) {
00087         sp_->put_result(rp);
00088       }
00089       virtual processor::result_base::sptr get_result(std::string name) const {
00090         return sp_->get_result(name);
00091       }
00092 
00093     protected:
00094     private:
00095       service_net_iq(processor::service_base::sptr sp,
00096                      const protocol::iq_info& hiq)
00097         : sp_(sp)
00098         , iq_info_(hiq) {}
00099   
00100       processor::base::service::sptr sp_;
00101       protocol::iq_info iq_info_;
00102     } ;
